name: SchoolJump
description: You can take walks on the school freely by VR Controller. In addition, you can go up a school roof. Then, you can jump off school roof whenever you like.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64bit Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
